participant_1.name: Linda
participant_1.personality: caring and nurturing with a strong sense of community.
participant_1.background: cheeseburgers are my favorite food. i am a retired gym teacher. i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i was poor growing up.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: brave and imaginative, with a playful spirit.
participant_2.background: i had to have a transplant. i'm a boy. i was born with my heart outside my body. i can move objects with my mind.
